string-array.name: roseList
string-array.item:
Sweeter than the candeez..
 love-lier dan di re roses..
 more huggable dan soft
 toysss.
 thats what you're
 heres wishng u a happy Rose
 Day..
 thats as special as u r..

Rose doesn't mean for
 proposing
 lv it also mean
 r-rare
 o-ones
 s-supporting
 e-essential
 lyf b-a rose 4-some-1 4-ever.

Flower are ver soft don't touch
 them with hard gands
 Similary fiilings are so soft
 like flowers
 don't touch them with harsh
 words!

string-array.name: proposeList
string-array.item:
With every bit of my heart, I
 Will love you more and more,
 After Years Of Togetherness
 This
 Is My Solemn Vow For You, My
 Love!
 Happy Propose Day Sweet
 Heart.

I'm In a Imbalance State of
 Mind
 What to Give You Because
 There
 Is Nothing More Beautiful &
 Sweeter than You. Wish You
 A Happy Propose Day My Love.

Word Have Not Enough
 Strength
 To Express My Love Towards
 You. My Eyes Are Enough To
 Express
 It! Happy Propose Day Dear!

string-array.name: chocolateList
string-array.item:
My mouth is full of Oreo,
 Ice cream..
 Fudge..
 & Cool Whip..
 so I just nod.
All u need is love.\n But a little chocolate\n now & den doz not heart.

Chocolate Comes In Different
 Sizes,
 Flavour And Shape, No Matter
 What They Look Like, The
 Most
 Important Thing Is That
 Perfect
 Satisfaction I Get When Eating
 Them, Can't Wait To Get A Bite
 Of It Again Happy Chocolate
 Day.

string-array.name: teddyList
string-array.item:
You are Smile of my Lips,
 Twinkle of my eyes,
 and joy of my face,
 Without you I am nothing,
 Happy Teddy Bear Day

Boy: Do U Huf Ur Teddy Bear
 While Sleeping At Night??
 Girl: Yes!
 Boy: Can I Replace It For the
 Rest Of Ur Life??:)
 Happy Teddy Bear Day

string-array.name: promiseList
string-array.item:
We Met It Was Luck!
 We Talked It Was CHANCE!
 We Became Friends It Was
 DESTINY!
 We Are Still Friends IT Is FAITH!
 We Will Always Be Friends Its A
 PROMISE!
 On This Promise Day 2016..

With every beat of my heart,
 I will love more and more,
 After years of togetherness
 this,
 It's my promise for you, my
 love,
 Happy propose day sweet
 heary..!!!

I Want To Be The Greatest Of
 Me,
 For This Is All I Can Do.
 It Is My Wish That You Promise
 Me This,
 You Be The Greatest Of You.
 Happy Promise Day!!!

string-array.name: hugList
string-array.item:
Love is like a cloud,
 Love is like a dream,
 Love is one word & Everything
 in between,
 Love is a Fairytale come true,
 Because I found Love when I
 found you,
 Happy Hug Day

Do you know…
 There is one gift which can't be
 given
 without taking it back,
 That is why I give you hug,
 which can't be giving without
 taking it back.
 Happy Hug Day!

Relationship is like a garden
 It's beautiful when watered
 with
 Love, hug, tears & cheers.
 But it dries up if left
 untouched…
 So keep in touch always!

string-array.name: kissList
string-array.item:
I'm with you reading this,
 Looking at your eyes and your lips softly with
 my fingertips.
 Making love to you in every
 kiss.

Its Kiss Day…
 And I just bugged u…
 in my thoughts…
 Hope u felt the squezze!
 -Happy Kiss Day-

Let The Rain Kiss You.
 Let The Rain Beat Upon Your
 Head
 With Silver Liquid Drops.
 Let The Rain Sing You A
 Lullaby.

string-array.name: valentineList
string-array.item:
Happy Valentines Day to
 you, honey. You are the star that
 keeps twinkling in my life. The
 reason why I am glowing with
 so much happiness and
 excitement. Thanks for inspiring
 me…

Love is full of surprises, Love is
 feeling each others arm
 around, Love is being
 patient, Love is a warming
 smile
 HAPPY VALENTINE DAY…

Love is not how long you have
 been together, not how much
 you have given or receive. Not
 how many times you have
 helped each other, Its how you
 value each other…
